sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  Box,
  Button,
  VStack,
  Heading,
  Text,
  Container,
  Icon,
  Flex,
  Badge,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';
import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom';
import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext';
import { FiShield, FiLock } from 'react-icons/fi';

const Login = () => {
  const { login } = useAuth();
  const navigate = useNavigate();

  const handleLogin = () => {
    login();
    navigate('/');
  };

  return (
    <Box
      minH="100vh"
      bgGradient="linear-gradient(135deg, #13151F 0%, #1E2137 100%)"
      position="relative"
      overflow="hidden"
    >
      {/* Animated gradient orbs */}
      <Box
        position="absolute"
        top="-20%"
        right="-10%"
        width="600px"
        height="600px"
        background="radial-gradient(circle, rgba(149, 128, 255, 0.2) 0%, transparent 70%)"
        filter="blur(60px)"
        animation="pulse 8s infinite"
      />
      <Box
        position="absolute"
        bottom="-30%"
        left="-15%"
        width="800px"
        height="800px"
        background="radial-gradient(circle, rgba(128, 255, 234, 0.15) 0%, transparent 70%)"
        filter="blur(60px)"
        animation="pulse 10s infinite"
      />
      
      <Container maxW="container.md" py={20} position="relative">
        <VStack spacing={8}>
          <Badge
            colorScheme="purple"
            py={2}
            px={6}
            borderRadius="full"
            textTransform="uppercase"
            letterSpacing="wider"
            fontSize="sm"
            bgGradient="linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(149, 128, 255, 0.2), rgba(128, 255, 234, 0.2))"
            border="1px solid"
            borderColor="whiteAlpha.200"
            backdropFilter="blur(10px)"
          >
            Enterprise Security Platform
          </Badge>
          
          <Box
            p={12}
            borderRadius="3xl"
            bg="rgba(26, 28, 42, 0.5)"
            borderWidth="1px"
            borderColor="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)"
            boxShadow="0 8px 32px 0 rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.37)"
            backdropFilter="blur(20px)"
            w="full"
            position="relative"
            overflow="hidden"
          >
            {/* Glowing border effect */}
            <Box
              position="absolute"
              top="-50%"
              left="-50%"
              width="200%"
              height="200%"
              background="conic-gradient(from 90deg at 50% 50%, #9580FF 0deg, #80FFEA 90deg, transparent 180deg, transparent 360deg)"
              opacity="0.1"
              animation="rotate 8s linear infinite"
            />
            <VStack spacing={8}>
              <Icon as={FiShield} w={16} h={16} color="#9580FF" />
              <VStack spacing={4}>
                <Heading 
                  size="xl" 
                  bgGradient="linear-gradient(45deg, #9580FF, #80FFEA)"
                  bgClip="text"
                >
                  Welcome to ThreatIntel AI
                </Heading>
                <Text color="whiteAlpha.800" textAlign="center" fontSize="lg">
                  Your comprehensive cybersecurity threat intelligence platform
                </Text>
              </VStack>

              <Button
                size="lg"
                width="full"
                height="60px"
                bgGradient="linear-gradient(45deg, #9580FF, #80FFEA)"
                color="white"
                _hover={{
                  bgGradient: "linear-gradient(45deg, #8070EF, #70EFDA)",
                  transform: "translateY(-2px)",
                  boxShadow: "0 0 20px rgba(149, 128, 255, 0.4)",
                }}
                _active={{
                  transform: "translateY(0)",
                }}
                leftIcon={<Icon as={FiLock} />}
                onClick={handleLogin}
              >
                Enter Secure Dashboard
              </Button>

              <Text color="whiteAlpha.600" fontSize="sm">
                Protected by advanced AI-powered security
              </Text>
            </VStack>
          </Box>
        </VStack>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

export default Login;
